message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"I; me (used by the speaker to refer to themselves)","sentence":"我喜欢牛奶。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation-style image of a happy person holding a glass of milk, standing in a surreal, gently crumbling cityscape with pastel skies and faint ruins in the background.
